# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item offers unparalleled quality and functionality, making it an invaluable asset for anyone looking to enhance their experience in [specific field or area]. Considering its unique features and benefits, we're offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $15000. This special offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your [specific needs or aspirations] with our top-tier solution. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
